description:
Title: Commodity Manager - Procurement

Location: Palm Beach Gardens, FL, USA, 33418

Duration: 6+ months (Possible Extension/Conversion)

Schedule: Standard Day Shift

Pay rate: Negotiable

Job Description

  • Manage and leverage strategic partnerships of the supply base to meet the company's procurement requirements in terms of quality, delivery and cost.
  • Carry out Procurement processes, standards, and operational plans, including RFPs, cost analysis, execute end-to-end negotiation process.
  • Compiles price proposals, financial reports, and other data and information to provide input on reasonable prices.
  • Prepares and manages sourcing events (RFx) and bid packages as needed.
  • Evaluate and select vendors based on capability, quality, reliability, and price. competitiveness.
  • Partner with internal clients and stakeholders to identify sourcing needs and improve sourcing strategy.
  • Bachelor's Degree required with 8+ years' experience.

Qualifications

  • Excellent verbal and written communications skills.
  • Cost reduction project leadership experience in a related environment preferred.
  • Ability to work effectively with cross-cultural suppliers on technical and logistics issues.
  • Highly organized with strong attention to detail, and superior follow-up and follow-through skills.
  • Team player and influencing skills required to establish and sustain a lean culture.
  • Strong negotiation skills.
  • Ability to thrive in a fast moving and unstructured environment.
